head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCGRATH, ETHEL FRANCES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCGRATH, ETHEL FRANCES

block.p: McGRATH--Ethel Frances, on January 24, 2007 in Washignton, DC. Beloved aunt of Thomas McGrath and Arleen Heiss. Burial at Woodlawn Cemetery, Bronx, New York at 11am Saturday, January 27. Memorial contributions can be made to The TelecomPioneers Charitable Foundation, Attn: Memorial Gifts, 930-15st St., (12th floor), Denver, CO 80202.

McGRATH--Ethel Frances, on January 24, 2007 in Washignton, DC. Beloved aunt of Thomas McGrath and Arleen Heiss. Burial at Woodlawn Cemetery, Bronx, New York at 11am Saturday, January 27. Memorial contributions can be made to The TelecomPioneers Charitable Foundation, Attn: Memorial Gifts, 930-15st St., (12th floor), Denver, CO 80202.
